channel.title: Arjun Anil Kumar DMS NITC
channel.description: Recent content on Arjun Anil Kumar DMS NITC

item.title: Applied Statistics
item.description: This course focusses on applied probability and statistical concepts to solve relevant business problems.

item.title: Quantitative Analytics
item.description: This graduate course covers all fundamental quantitative methods in Analytics

item.title: Location
item.description: Professor Dr von Igelfeld's mailing and office addresses at the Institute of Romance Philology.

item.title: Office Hours
item.description: Schedule and location for Professor Dr von Igelfeld's office hours.

item.title: Your Inner Hedgehog
item.description: This paper describes the inner hedgehog, a psychological condition widespread in academia. Published in the Journal of Socio-Experimental Psychology, 2021.

item.title: Development of new index-based methodology for extraction of built-up area from landsat7 imagery: Comparison of performance with svm, ann, and existing indices
item.description: The study proposes an urban index for computing built-up area from Landsat imagery

item.title: Cross-sectional study of factors influencing the residential water demand in Bangalore
item.description: The study investigates the influences of demographic and infrastructural covariates that drive the household water demand in the 198 municipal wards of Bangalore, India.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Portugese Irregular Verbs
item.description: This book discusses Portugese irregular verbs in great details.
